about_the_game:
In this modernized version of The Settlers – Rise of an Empire, you can build vibrant cities in a medieval world. Each character leads their individual lives and can be observed by you at any time. The main goal of the game is to increase the wealth of your empire and to go down in history as a legendary king. Includes the main game and the expansion The Eastern Realm.
IMPROVEMENT HIGHLIGHTS: Windows 10 compatible, multiplayer via Uplay
detailed_description:
In this modernized version of The Settlers – Rise of an Empire, you can build vibrant cities in a medieval world. Each character leads their individual lives and can be observed by you at any time. The main goal of the game is to increase the wealth of your empire and to go down in history as a legendary king. Includes the main game and the expansion The Eastern Realm.
IMPROVEMENT HIGHLIGHTS: Windows 10 compatible, multiplayer via Uplay

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Originally released for Windows 7, the game can be played on Windows 10 and Windows 11 OS
  • Processor: 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB DirectX 11–compliant card with Shader Model 4.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11-compliant sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Originally released for Windows 7, the game can be played on Windows 10 and Windows 11 OS
  • Processor: 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB DirectX 11–compliant card with Shader Model 4.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11-compliant sound card

short_description: Build vibrant cities in a medieval world with this modernized version of The Settlers – Rise of an Empire. Each character leads their individual lives and can be observed by you at any time. Will you go down in history as a legendary king?
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Polish*
*languages with full audio support
